Row.Text: Oda Nobunaga, bane of those who embrace tradition, annihilator of the divine and the mysterious. You have been called to once more to unify Japan and polish it into the shining jewel of the East. Face only forward, avoid treachery, and unite all under the heavens by force.
"It cannot be helped!"
Oda Nobunaga
Daimyo of the Oda Clan, One of the Three Great Unifiers of Japan, the so-called Fool of Owari, the Demon King of the Sixth Heaven

Nobu's combat bonuses lend her towards conquering her home continent, especially upon the advent of Gunpowder. Soon after (or perhaps during), she benefits discovering trade opportunities across the globe.

Nobu's primary goal is to dominate her own continent, then build it into a powerhouse for whichever victory she chooses to pursue whilst maintaining trade with her overseas counterparts. Religiously-focused Civilizations should be a priority target due to her combat bonus versus them, as well as her lucrative Culture bonus from pillaging Holy Sites.

The soldier of fortune from the Warring States Period, Oda Nobunaga. While she was called the "Big Fool of Owari" in her childhood, she made a name for herself in the world upon defeating Imagawa Yoshimoto in Okehazama. Afterwards, she eliminated many formidable enemies one after the other and even had the unification of the country within reach of her hands, but passed away in Honnouji thanks to the insurrection of Akechi Mitsuhide.
Height/Weight: 152cm/43kg[NEWLINE]Region: Japan[NEWLINE]Alignment: Lawful Neutral[NEWLINE]Gender: Female[NEWLINE]"It cannot be helped!"

Haughty and self-confident, she possesses a flexible way of thinking that loves new things and is not bound by conservatism and common sense. The individual who caused the de facto downfall of the Muromachi Shogunate, and had great influence in the closure of the long, turbulent war period that lasted since the Onin War. That clothing that looks like a military uniform is something she prepared herself out of hobby upon being summoned as a Servant.

Tenka Fubu: A[NEWLINE]A unique Skill of Nobunaga, the reformer of an era. Conceptual reform that widely imposes the new over the old. Against opponents that possess a high rank of "Divinity" or "Mystery", or Heroic Spirits who are qualified as guardians of the order, plus modifiers will be bestowed upon herself. Conversely, against those that possess low mystery - such as modern Heroic Spirits - the effectiveness of all her Skills, and Noble Phantasms will fall.

Three Thousand Worlds[NEWLINE]Rank: E~A[NEWLINE]Type: Anti-Army[NEWLINE]The three-steps shooting of Nagashino. Deploys three thousand arquebuses and uses them for volley firing. Due to its famous anecdote of defeating the strongest cavalry of the Warring States Period, attack power increases against Heroic Spirits that possess the Skill Riding. They are nothing but normal arquebuses against Heroic Spirits that do not possess the Riding Skill, but a volley firing of three thousands is already enough of a threat in itself.

Demon Lord of the Sixth Heaven is the name of a demon lord from Buddhism, which Nobunaga is said to have once self-styled. Thanks to the severe deeds she performed while alive (exemplified by the "Setting Afire of Mt. Hiei") and the accumulated feelings of fear and reverence held by the later masses, Heroic Spirit Nobunaga manifests as a demon lord.

Nobunaga had worked vigorously towards the unification of the country, but her end came from the insurrection of a vassal. She shows no regret about that in itself, saying it was "something that couldn't be helped". Does not particularly have a wish for the Holy Grail, but it is very likely that, due her tendency for unusual ideas, she may use the Holy Grail itself to make some sort of bomb.
+{1_Value} near enemy Holy Sites on home Continent
+{1_Value} vs. Warrior Monks
Demon King of the Sixth Heaven

Tries to quickly expand on her own Continent, but is unlikely to expand to other Continents. Has a propensity to declare Wars of Territorial Expansion. Likes Civilizations with high Culture or Science on other Continents. Dislikes those who have founded a Religion on her own Continent.
Nobu is fascinated by the technological developments of your overseas culture
Nobu is enthralled by the arts and civics of your overseas culture
Nobu does not take kindly to Divine threats on her home turf
Uwahahaha! Feast your eyes upon me, Demon Archer Oda Nobunaga! You find it bizarre that I'm a woman? Oh, it appears as if you have a death wish.
Come, bask in the glory of the Land of the Rising Sun! I will personally perform the legendary Atsumori dance for you at our capital! EV-ERY-BO-DY! A-TSU-MO-RI!
An intriguing offer indeed! I will gladly take this opportunity to learn new things from your culture which I can use to consolidate power in my own!
Shall we arrange a visit to each other's Capitals? Oh, but when I visit, you may want to tell any monks around to board up their houses. I can't make any guarantees about their safety otherwise!
Yo!

I accept your offer! We can participate in a traditional Japanese celebration of our newly forged friendship, such as lying around naked and watching TV! Huh? You find it bizarre that I have had a TV since long before it was even invented? You sure wonder about silly things! Shouldn't the surprise come from the "naked" part?
The Demon King of the Sixth Heaven has no need for new friends!
You have been given the greatest honor of your life. An offer of friendship with me, the King of Heroes and ruler of all beneath the sky. Accept.
Fantastic! We shall have some of my finest tea in celebration. I will even pour it myself! Consider it an honor!
Nobu?! You don't want to be friends with the Demon King of th--hmm. Saying it out loud like that, perhaps I see why...
...heh. Hehe. Fwahahahahaha! To come directly at Demon King Nobunaga takes serious guts! Very well, I shall rise to your challenge! Taste the might of Oda Nobunaga!
I have grown weary of your impudence! All who stand before me shall be destroyed!

I'm...totally exhausted. I suppose it cannot be helped. A person normally only has 50 years of life...except in this game, where a king can live 6,050 years...anyway, I congratulate you on your victory!

I'm...totally exhausted. I suppose it cannot be helped. A person normally only has 50 years of life...except in this game, where a king can live 6,050 years...anyway, I congratulate you on your victory!
Your delegation has been warmly received in my court! And by "my court" I mean my niece Chacha, who seems to have hoarded every coin they gifted us for herself!
Foreign delegations are usually welcome in the court of Oda Nobunaga. But yours? Something about them stinks.
I have sent Nobukatsu with a gift to your nation. Please accept it! Er, wait, that's not quite right. I sent him to you AS the gift and don't really want him back. Please accept him!
You're the best best best! Peace and quiet at last!
Nooo! I don't want to hear him chew me out when he gets back!
Is that so. A demon such as myself will certainly remember such nasty words directed at her.
Always up for injecting Japan with more foreign influence! Go right ahead.
Hmm, maybe later? Right now I'm too busy farming QP.

I tire of attending these meetings. I would much prefer to attend my subjects' weddings. Here, my retainers will construct an embassy in your capital, so that I can occupy myself with the finer things in life.
Very well!
Well, isn't that a shame.

The Demon King of Japan will let the world know what she thinks of you! ...well, maybe I should try to give myself a more approachable title if I want it to mean anything to the other leaders. (Denounces You)
The stench of the Divine wafts from your country over to mine. Are you familiar with what I do to temples and the monks within?
(You have founded a Religion on her home continent.)
I absolutely love your country's technological and cultural advances! Especially the fact that I can use them to tear down the traditions of my own country! Then I can rule it with an iron fist!
(You are an advanced overseas power, from whom she can benefit greatly via trade.)
You have made a pact with a Demon! I suppose now you are the Demon King of the Seventh Heaven! Fwahahahaa
No thanks. Maybe if you gave me 10 or 20 Hearts of the Foreign God.
Accepted!
Rejected!
Is that so.
Nobu?!
Feast your eyes upon this magnanimous offer!.
Yeah, I've had my fill too. That was fun, though! Let's do it again sometime! Wahahaha!
My muskets remain loaded by the thousands! There is no escape from Oda Nobunaga!
Making demands of a Demon King?! You utter fool!
Well...can't be helped.

To think that even the great Oda Nobunaga could be pressed to sue for peace. Well, there's the deal.

Opening my borders to foreign cultures which will subvert the fabric of thousands of years of Japanese culture is my favorite thing, aside from Okita's feet and setting fire to temples with women and children still inside! Deal!
I like trading with your country, but outright opening my borders to all of your citizens is a liiiiittle too far, don't you think?
Opening your borders to me will certainly prove to be an interesting decision!

Don't worry, they were just there to squash rebellions from the many other clans in my own nation. They shall not be used to attack you!
Oda Nobunaga stations her troops as she pleases!
I have a musket ready for each and every troop you have amassed on our border so threateningly. Shall we give them a test?
織田信長よ、因習を抱え込む者たちの宿敵、神性と神秘を破壊者。 再び日本を天下統一して東方の燦爛たる宝石に磨くために召喚された。 前のみに向かい、裏切り事を避き、天の下の全てを兵力で統一する事を。
是非もないネ！
織田信長
織田氏の大名, 戦国三英傑の一つ, いわゆる尾張の大うつけ、第六天魔王
ノッブの戦闘力ボーナスは（特に火薬の研究完了後）自宅大陸の征服を補助とするでしょう。 その後（あるいはおそらく間中）、他の大陸で貿易の機会を発見することで恩恵をも受け取るだろう。
ノッブの主な目的は、自宅大陸を支配し、それから海外の相手との貿易を維持しながら選択した勝利条件へのための大国に建てる。聖地を略奪からの有利な文化力産出量ボーナスがあるので、宗教中心の文明は征服の主目標に所定するほうがいい。
戦国の風雲児、織田信長。[NEWLINE]幼少時は「尾張の大うつけ」と呼ばれたが桶狭間で今川義元を破り、天下に名乗りを上げる。[NEWLINE]その後、次々と強敵を打ち破り天下統一目前に迫るも、明智光秀の謀反により本能寺にて没する。
身長／体重：152cm・43kg[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]出典：史実[NEWLINE]地域：日本[NEWLINE]属性：秩序・中庸[NEWLINE]性別：女性[NEWLINE]「是非もないネ！」
尊大にして自信家、新しいもの好きで旧弊や常識にとらわれない柔軟な思考を持つ。[NEWLINE] 室町幕府を事実上滅亡させ、応仁の乱から続く長き戦国乱世の終結に多大な影響を与えた人物。[NEWLINE]軍服っぽい衣装はサーヴァントとして召喚されたおり、趣味で個人的に用意させたもの。
天下布武：Ａ[NEWLINE]時代の変革者たる信長の特殊スキル。[NEWLINE]古きに新しきを布く概念の変革。[NEWLINE]「神性」や「神秘」のランクが高い相手や、体制の守護者たる英霊などであればあるほど自分に有利な補正が与えられる。[NEWLINE]逆に神秘の薄い近代の英霊などには自身の各種スキル、宝具の効果が落ちる。
『三千世界』[NEWLINE]ランク：Ｅ～Ａ 種別：対軍宝具[NEWLINE]長篠の三段撃ち。三千丁の火縄銃を展開、一斉射撃する。[NEWLINE]戦国最強の騎馬軍団を打ち破った余りにも有名なその逸話から、騎乗スキルを持つ英霊には攻撃力が増加する。[NEWLINE]騎乗スキルを持たない英霊にはただの火縄銃であるが、三千丁もの一斉射撃はただそれだけでも脅威である。
第六天魔王とは信長自身が自称したといわれる仏教における欲界の魔王の名である。[NEWLINE] 生前に行った「比叡山焼き討ち」に代表される苛烈な所業や、後世に民衆が抱き積み重ねた恐怖、畏敬の念により、魔王としての英霊信長が顕現する。
天下統一へと邁進した信長であったが、その最後は家臣の謀反によるものであった。[NEWLINE]それ自体は「是非もなき事」として悔いてはいない。[NEWLINE]聖杯への願いも特に持たないが、得意の斜め上な発想で聖杯自体を使い、何かをしでかす可能性は十分にある。
首都大陸に敵の聖地の近くにボーナス+{1_Value}
武僧に対するボーナス+{1_Value}
第六天魔王
自分の大陸ですばやく拡大しようとするが、他の大陸にほとんど拡大しない。領土拡張戦争を宣言する傾向がある。[ICON_Science] 科学や [ICON_Culture] 文化が高める他の大陸にいる文明が好み。 同じ大陸で宗教を創始した文明を嫌う。
